snippet.title: PaulPaul- Act 1 Full Playthrough (HTC VIVE VR)
snippet.description: Playing through the very off-putting first act of Paul Paul which released for FREE on Steam today. A very strange game with a very cool environment. I didn't realize it was only the first act while I was playing, which maybe explains why I almost played through the entire game again before realizing. Enjoy!
